title: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter domestic sales surge 81 pc to 3,58,151 units in March
description: Exports increased 95 per cent to 28,304 units last month from 14,460 units in March 2023, Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India (HMSI) said in a statement. The total sales rose to 3,86,455 units last month against 2,12,002 units in the same month last year, it added.
